arts.ttl: Coppa Italia | AC Milan 6-1 Sassuolo: Match Report
arts.sum: AC Milan delivered an impressive performance in the Coppa Italia, defeating Sassuolo 6-1 in a one-sided round of 16 match at the Stadio Giuseppe Meazza. The post Coppa Italia | AC Milan 6-1 Sassuolo: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: AC Milan and Bologna reach Italian Cup quarterfinals with convincing wins
arts.sum: Tuesday’s match at San Siro was all but over after less than 23 minutes as Sassuolo was swept away by a double from Samuel Chukwueze and other goals by Tijjani Reijnders and Rafael Leão. Milan nevertheless extended its advantage through Davide Calabria and Tammy Abraham, either side of a consolation goal for Sassuolo from Samuele Mulattieri.
